EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Copado!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to the team!
We are so excited to have you join us on this incredible journey.
You will be completing a tailored Onboarding program over the next 4 weeks that will give you important tools and knowledge to be successful. Taking this time to master our products, ecosystem, and competitive landscape will allow you to hit the ground running!
Kristi McNabb and Lisa Maguire are your dedicated Sales Enablement team and will be guiding you through the process.
Scotty Morrison & Jaime Djuric are here to support you from an HR perspective.
Note on Agenda:
We have included your schedule for Mon and Tues of next week so you can plan ahead. All calendar invites will show up on your Copado google calendar once you are able to log into your laptop. (If there are any conflicts or access issues please advise ASAP)
Agenda Snapshot:
Monday
10-11am CST: Welcome to Copado
12-2pm CST: New Hire HR Orientation
3-4pm CST: IT Check In
Tuesday
8-9am CST: Copado Sales Process
10-11am CST: All Hands Accelerate Session
